content.prompt: In the last two sentences of the fifth paragraph, the author presents Walt Whitman as a figure who

choices.label: embodies the complex relationship between individualistic and communal thinking in American culture
illustrates the hypocrisy underlying the celebration of communal thinking in American culture
shows the impossibility of reconciling individualistic and communal thinking in American culture
adopted a position on communal thinking that was opposed to dominant societal views on the subject

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
